trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class creates an attribute scoped query (ASQ) control.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> cria um controle de ASQ (consulta de escopo de atributo).

trans-unit.source: This control is used with a search request to force the query to be based on a specific DN-valued attribute.
trans-unit.target: Esse controle é usado com uma solicitação de pesquisa para fazer com que a consulta seja baseada em um atributo com valor de DN específico.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The attribute name on which the query is based.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atributo no qual a consulta é baseada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class using the specified attribute name.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> usando o nome de atributo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.AttributeName" /> property gets or sets the attribute name on which the search query is based.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.AttributeName" /> obtém ou define o nome do atributo no qual a consulta de pesquisa é baseada.

trans-unit.source: The attribute name on which the search query is based.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atributo no qual a consulta de pesquisa é baseada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.GetValue" /> method returns the binary representation of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" />.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.GetValue" /> retorna a representação binária do <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" />.
